summary: This release brings Grove's powerful blog engine to life with major new features like Stripe payments and an enhanced CDN uploader with AI analysis. We've made significant improvements to the admin panel and landing page, fixed key navigation and deployment issues, and laid the groundwork for easy publishing. Overall, this update solidifies Grove as a friendly, multi-tenant platform ready to help creators build and grow their own beautiful spaces.

features: Set up GitHub Packages publishing for @autumnsgrove/groveengine
Add CDN admin upload system with R2 storage
Add Stripe payments system with provider abstraction
Add example site link to landing page and prepare workspace
Add example site showcasing all GroveEngine features
Add enhanced CDN Uploader with AI analysis to admin panel
Complete blog engine migration from AutumnsGrove to packages/engine
Add temporary Stripe branding assets (icon + logo)
Add Grove Design System UI component library
fixes: Update engine component imports to use main export for Rollup resolution
Add smooth scroll and URL hash update to TOC navigation
Sync package-lock.json with package.json for CI
Deploy example site and update dependencies
Use hardcoded font stacks to avoid theme() lookup issues
Update success message to mention confirmation email
Enable autofill and text expansion on email input
